All Implemented Interfaces:
io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.client.gui.TParentElement, io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.client.util.interfaces.ITooltipProvider, io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.util.interfaces.IEnableStateProvider
public final class BetterStatsPanel extends BSComponentPanel
A BSComponentPanel that usually goes on the BetterStatsScreen.

It displays player statistics, alongside other components such as the StatFiltersPanel and MenuBarPanel.
